question: What's the difference between const and let?

options.text: A const can only be assigned once
options.value: A const can only be assigned once

options.text: A let can only be assigned once
options.value: A let can only be assigned once

options.text: A const is always globally scoped
options.value: A const is always globally scoped

answer: A const can only be assigned once
